definition: Qiang ethnic group, nowadays esp. in north Sichuan
muntjac/grammar particle indicating nonsense (classical)
Qiang ethnic group of northwestern Sichuan/surname Qiang
variant of 羌[qiang1]
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture (Tibetan: rnga ba bod rigs cha'ng rigs rang skyong khul, formerly in Kham province of Tibet), northwest Sichuan, capital Barkam 馬爾康鎮|马尔康镇[Ma3 er3 kang1 zhen4]
pinyin: A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1

definition: Beichuan Qiang autonomous county in Mianyang 綿陽|绵阳[Mian2 yang2], north Sichuan
pinyin: Bei3 chuan1 Qiang1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

sentences.english: In addition, the ministry will accelerate construction of an ecological reserve for Qiang ethnic culture.
sentences.chinese: 同时，政府部门将加快羌族文化生态保护区建设。

sentences.english: The implementation of the system of the Dala chieftain is also typically discussed.
sentences.chinese: 并以此为典型反映土司制度在羌族地区的施行状况。

sentences.english: Han Jia, you are dressed like a Qiang girl.
sentences.chinese: 韩佳，你打扮成羌族姑娘。

sentences.english: Wang Han was a poet of Hexi, Qiang Minority in Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 王翰，元代河西诗人，党项羌族。

sentences.english: The Qiang people are members of one of the most ancient ethnic groups in China.
sentences.chinese: 羌族是中国最古老的少数民族之一。

sentences.english: Qiang people migrated to the interior of China under the oppression of the ruling class during Qin and Han Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 秦汉时期羌族在统治阶级的压迫下不断向内地迁徙。

sentences.english: Photographs and videos of the Qiang people before and after the quake are also on show.
sentences.chinese: 同时也展出了有关震前震后羌族人民的照片和录像。

sentences.english: The Qiang people's folk songs are an important part of her folk literature.
sentences.chinese: 羌族歌谣是羌族民间文学的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The Qiang people's folk songs are an important part of her folk literature.
sentences.chinese: 羌族歌谣是羌族民间文学的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Don't you forget that Shennong, the Yan Emperor, was the chief of the ancient Qiang tribesmen.
sentences.chinese: 你忘了，这炎帝神农氏是古时候羌族的首领。

sentences.english: The prosperity of the people with a surname of Lee in Longxi has consanguinity with the development of the ancient Qiang nationality.
sentences.chinese: 陇西李氏之兴，与古羌族的发展有密切的血缘关系。

sentences.english: Guahong is the highest convenance of the Qiang people which is seldom known to outside world.
sentences.chinese: 挂红是羌族的最高礼仪，向来不为外界所知。

sentences.english: The bunker is the most outstanding virtual custom with the national characteristics of Qiang Nationality.
sentences.chinese: 碉楼是羌族最具有民族特色的物质民俗。

sentences.english: Minzhou is the birthplace of the ancient Qiang nationality.
sentences.chinese: 岷州是古羌族的发祥地之一。

Tubo or Tufan, old name for Tibet/the Tibetan Tubo dynasty 7th-11th century AD/also pr. [Tu3 fan1]
Tibetan ethnic group
Yugur ethnic group of Gansu
Tangut branch of the Qiang 羌 ethnic group/ancient ethnic group who made up the Xixia dynasty 西夏 1038-1227
Pumi ethnic group
Tuyuhun, a Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people/a state in Qinhai in 4th-7th century AD
Turkic ethnic group
Tangut branch of the Qiang 羌 ethnic group/ancient ethnic group who made up the Xixia dynasty 西夏 1038-1227
Tujia ethnic group of Hunan
Wa, Kawa or Va ethnic group of Myanmar, south China and southeast Asia
